group_1.textRight: H-hello...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, it’s Ren! @Hello!
Emily is out. @I don’t think Rika is with her, either.

group_1.textRight: Oh... erm... @I’m not looking for Rika...
I wanted to ask for...@To ask Emiri for some advice...

group_1.textLeft: You only want Emily? That's unusual for you.
I can listen to you in Emily’s stead, if you'd like.

group_1.textRight: Eh... can you do that?

group_1.textLeft: But of course. @I've had to hold the fort here several times.

group_1.textRight: Well, I mean, there's lots of times I've had to @keep an eye on the place too, but...
Have you actually been asked for advice?

group_1.textLeft: No.

group_1.textRight: That was blunt.

group_1.textLeft: Don’t fret!
I'm a supermodel! I have much more life experience than most people!
Well then, Ren!
As far as I'm aware, this is the first time anyone's @come to a supermodel to consult on a problem.
Be honored knowing I'll listen to whatever you @have to say.

group_1.textRight: Ah... Sure...

group_1.textLeft: You don't have to ask her for help, Ren.
Why don't we just hang out until Emily arrives?
Excuse me?!

group_1.textRight: Um... Emiri isn't...the only one...@whose opinion I need...
I'd like to ask for...both of yours as well... yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Eh? Are you cool with that?

group_1.textRight: Yes... Well... I want to go somewhere...
A place that would make someone smile on @Christmas Eve...

group_1.textLeft: What?! @What exactly are you planning?!
So that's what you wanted advice on.

group_1.textRight: Uh...um...there are so many... @There are many places I'd like to visit...
But I can't imagine... what it would be like... @to actually...go...
In the end...I just can't decide...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, so you wanted Emily's opinion?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: I don't think I have anything helpful to say...
The same goes for you, right, Ria?
Y-you do realize I'm an expert when it comes to @these things, right?!
I can show you all the places one could ever dream @of visiting on Christma—

group_1.textRight: Oh, hey, have you checked out this magazine?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Are you ignoring my brilliance?!
This is what Emily and Rika were reading earlier.
It's supposed to be a special Christmas issue. @So you might find it helpful.

group_1.textRight: Oh... Thank you... @Thank you so much... yeah...
(...Ah, these sticky notes in the pages... @These are the type that Rika uses...)
(This sticky note is for...@"The Candlelit Night Special..." Huh...)

group_1.textLeft: I've heard there's all sorts of stuff going on.
Things like illuminations and other kinds of events.

group_1.textRight: Ah, yes...!
(Illuminations are...so shining and...beautiful...)
(An event like that...would definitely suit Rika...)

group_1.textLeft: Don't be so presumptuous, Ren Isuzu.
This magazine certainly features many places that @are in vogue.
However! You need to discern for yourself which @one of these things...
Is going to be the best for the both of you.

group_1.textRight: S-sure...?
Please don’t suggest something inappropriate.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Th-that's not what I was going to do!
Simply put, there are places that look photogenic, @but may actually be disappointing in person.

group_1.textRight: Well, you do have a point...

group_1.textLeft: I’m usually quite busy, but as it so happens, @my schedule is free right now.
That means I could guide you around the city... @So what do you say?

group_1.textRight: Eh... erm... [chara:302501:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302501:motion_200][chara:302501:lipSynch_1] @P-please do... Yeah...
[chara:300801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Seriously?!
Look, this is kind of worrying. @Why don't I tag along?

group_1.textLeft: Aren't you supposed to be watching the office?

group_1.textRight: Ehh? @Well, yeah, but...

group_1.textLeft: Look, Ren, if you feel uncomfortable... @You don't have to force yourself to go.

group_1.textRight: Well... I don't feel...uncomfortable...@about this... Yeah...
I’m actually very grateful... @Please take care of me...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, yes, you'll be in good hands.
